resources.string: A LazyRow is a horizontal scrolling list that only renders the elements that are visible.
A LazyColumn is a vertical scrolling list that only renders the elements that are visible.
To sort a list of elements in a mesh horizontally, this component gives us the option to define the approximate height of the elements within it.
To sort a list of elements in a mesh vertically, this component gives us the option to define the approximate width of the elements within it.
This API displays the elements in the same way as a LazyHorizontalGrid, with the difference that it allows each element to have a width independent of the other elements in the list.
This API displays the elements in the same way as a LazyVerticalGrid, with the difference that it allows each element to have a height independent of the other elements in the list.
